Package com.capgemini.wsb.fitnesstracker.training.api

Interface TrainingProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
TrainingServiceImpl
public interface TrainingProvider

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Training>
    getAllTrainings()
    Retrieves all trainings.

    Retrieves a training based on their ID.

  • Method Details

    • getTraining

      Optional<User> getTraining(Long trainingId)
      Retrieves a training based on their ID. If the user with given ID is not found, then Optional.empty() will be returned.
      Parameters:
      trainingId - id of the training to be searched
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the located Training, or Optional.empty() if not found

    • getAllTrainings

      List<Training> getAllTrainings()
      Retrieves all trainings.
      Returns:
      A list of all trainings

    • getTrainingsByUser

      List<Training> getTrainingsByUser(Long userId)
      Retrieves a list of trainings associated with the given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of trainings associated with the user

    • getTrainingsEndingAfter

      List<Training> getTrainingsEndingAfter(Date date)
      Retrieves a list of trainings that end after the specified date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to compare against the end time of trainings
      Returns:
      a list of trainings that end after the specified date

    • getTrainingsByType

      List<Training> getTrainingsByType(ActivityType type)
      Retrieves a list of trainings based on the specified activity type.
      Parameters:
      type - the activity type to filter the trainings by
      Returns:
      a list of trainings matching the specified activity type

    • getById

      Optional<Training> getById(Long id)
      Retrieves a training based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the training to be searched
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the located Training, or Optional.empty() if not found
